column5: Heads up folks the perch fishing is on fire right now in Lowbanks Lake Erie lots of limits of big perch being caught ...new leader today for the perch derby 1.4 lbs and lots bigger being caught but no ticket .. Shinners and Pickeral rigs in 22fow ...if you need to find the location drop me a pm
Glad to hear.  Are these fish being caught by boat or by shore, or both?  I have heard the term before but not quite sure what is meant by pickeral rigs?
Last I heard they were being caught from boats. But some are still being caught from shore.
they are getting them off port maitland pier....but if your going there stop in dunnville for minnows no minnows at port maitland ..
